idea:
We are engaged in R&D, manufacturing and sale of nutraceuticals products. We believe in science and research and are focused on providing safe products for resolving skin concerns and general well being.


The company was incorporated in January 2021 and is currently self funded.
name: LAKAVISH NUTRATECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Novo Medi Science Private Limited incorporated in the year 2013, is a pharmaceutical company engaged in manufacturing, research and development, processing, packing, dealing, buying selling, distributing, import and export of pharmaceutical, medical, drugs, organic and inorganic fine chemicals and formulation, laboratory chemicals, chemicals required in pharmaceutical manufacturing.


Novo Medi Sciences Pvt. Ltd., Head Quartered in Mumbai, India. Novo is founded by India’s oldest and most trusted pharmaceutical business group. The promoters of this group are well renowned in the Pharmaceutical industry by the medical fraternity & corporate houses due to over 70 years of presence. Mr. Vipul R. Bhagat, Co-founder& President &Mrs. Anju Gupta Kaudanya, Chairperson & CEO have been engaged in the business of specialty pharmaceuticals for the last 35 years
name: NOVO MEDI SCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our vision is to revolutionize the end to end journey from sourcing to payment (S2P) for businesses, especially SMEs globally. The SMEs have been underserved and do not have any comprehensive end to end S2P solutions currently. We are committed to making the work smarter, easier, and more efficient, through cutting edge technologies (e.g., Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Smart Analytics) for the buyers and for the suppliers. We are currently building the solution with our first customer in India. We are a team of 10 people and are adding a few more resources shortly.
name: FACT WISE TECH PRIVATE LIMITED
